pages.text: The $(4)Blood Bound Executioner$() is the ultimate judge. It does not just wound; it ends lives with surgical precision.
The blade possesses a $(n)Execution Aura$(): any foe weakened to $(c)20% Health$() or less will be $(4)instantly executed$() in a single strike. No armor can prevent this final judgment.
By $(6)Sneak-Right-Clicking$(), the wielder can manifest their own blood into a $(c)Blood Spear$(), a devastating projectile that pierces through enemies from a distance.
